TopicTitle: Rocket wont show Δv when pulling fuel through fuel line

Articles.Content:
Hello I found a bug were i have my fuel tanks front, and my engine block separated by a T00B-250 (medium sized tube) to help push mass front. I have then connected the fuel stack with the engine via fuel lines. The craft can burn fuel, but it will show as 0 Δv available. Which makes it impossible to do maneuver nodes. 


Here you can see the engines burning fuel, without having any Δv

Here you can get a sense of the vehicle:

Red: fuel stack, engine and wings.
Orange: Medium Tube (empty space)
Blue: Fuel Line.


Win 11 home

Edited June 1, 2023 by Anth12
added system detail and game build
